body.p: The Main Control Panel provides access to a variety of configuration options that allow you to customize the application's behavior and appearance. The following options are available:

dlentry.dd: Turns on or off system notifications for important events and updates. When enabled, you will receive pop-up alerts and messages.
Automatically launches the application when you log in to your system. Disable this option if you prefer to start the application manually.
Allows you to choose between Light, Dark, or System Default themes to adjust the application's appearance according to your preference.
Sets the display language for the application interface. Select your preferred language from the available list.
When enabled, the application will periodically check for software updates and notify you when a new version is available.
Provides options to back up your current configuration or restore from a previous backup. Useful for migrating settings or recovering from issues.
Restores all settings in the Main Control Panel to their original default values. Use this option if you want to undo all customizations.

section.title: Related Information
section.p: For more details on configuring advanced preferences, see Actions Preferences.
